content.prompt: The tempo markings above the score tell the performers to

choices.label: slow down throughout the entire excerpt
speed up throughout the entire excerpt

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.G: Use terms and symbols to describe aspects of musical design in notated music, including texture, timbre, and instrumentation, and expressive elements, including dynamics, articulation, and tempo.
